original_text: And he shall sprinkle some of the blood on it with his finger seven times, and cleanse it and consecrate it from the uncleannesses of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 또 손가락으로 그 피를 그 위에 일곱 번 뿌려 이스라엘 자손의 부정에서 제단을 성결하게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: And he shall sprinkle some of the blood on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것에 피를 약간 뿌릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: from the uncleannesses of the people of Israel
